original: The All Seeing Eye is watching you...
Planning notes so you will know.
What the food and drink companies are not telling you!
translated: 食品饮料公司不会告诉你的真相！
主题：控制论与大规模监视

original: Hi - I have loved this site for a long time. First time poster. Typing one handed. Not! LOL! Listen, I know it sounds crazy, but I was tagged with a human-implantable tracking device as a baby in the 1970s. My brothers had natural births at home but I was delivered in the hospital. Whilst they both have high-flying careers and beautiful families, my life has been defined by a spiral of drug abuse and manic depression. All my friends turned on me in high school and since then I have been sacked repeatedly from dead-end jobs and dumped by every ugly girl who was medicated enough to sleep with me. Everyone I meet tries to fuck with my head. I have the sensation of being followed constantly and every time I take a crap I feel like there is someone watching FROM INSIDE THE BOWL. I thought that I had finally rid myself of the evil spychip when I cut off my left hand a couple of years ago but the mind games have got worse. Can anyone help? Was this not prophesied in the Bible? Whose laughing now? Not ME!!!
translated: 嗨，我在这个网站潜水很久了。第一次发帖，单手打字。才怪！哈哈！听着，我知道这听起来很疯狂，但在我刚出生的时候 (上世纪七十年代)，我的身体就被植入了追踪器。我的两个哥哥都是在家顺产的，但我是在医院接生的。他俩事业腾飞、家庭美满，而我的人生则是在滥用毒品和躁郁症中度过的。高中时，所有朋友都背叛了我。自那以后，我接连丢掉了各种没前途的工作，就连吸毒昏头到和我上床的丑女也都甩掉了我。遇到的所有人都想搞乱我的脑子。我一直觉得有人在跟踪我，每次拉屎都有人在马桶里监视我。几年前我砍掉了左手，以为自己终于摆脱了邪恶的监视芯片，结果心理战的战况反而更糟了。有人能帮我吗？圣经里没有预示这些吗？是谁笑到了最后？反正不是我！！！

original: I hate to disappoint you, Skull, but the Book of Richard states that we will receive the number of the beast on our right hand. I guess that your piano-playing days are over, dude.
translated: 我不想打击你，Skull，但启示录里说我们的右手会打上兽的印记。看来你没法弹钢琴了，老兄。

original: A program of mass surveillance is underway in our homes. I am convinced that a number of big companies are locked into a conspiracy with the government to install bugging devices in their products. I am particularly suspicious of those plug-in air fresheners that my mother buys... why do they need to be attached to the electricity supply? Lavender is a scent of social control.
translated: 大规模监视的计划正在我们的家里推进。我很确定，许多大公司都被卷入了政府的阴谋，在产品里安装了窃听器。我特别怀疑我妈新买的电动空气清新剂... 为什么一定要插电？社会控制是薰衣草味的。

original: Let me guess, Bildeberg. You're a live-at-home virgin who still masturbates over his mother. Exercise videos and professional wrestling excite you but you're too much of a pussy to come out so masquerading as a misunderstood new-age goth. You use conspiracy theories as a defense mechanism to hide from the horrific truth that you are already dead inside... etc. etc. Close to the mark?
translated: 我猜猜，Bildeberg。你是一个和父母同住的处男，还在对着亲妈撸管。健身视频和职业摔角戳你性癖，但你胆小到不敢出柜，只能装作是被误解的新潮哥特人。你把阴谋论当作心理防御机制，不敢面对你的精神早已死亡的可怖现实... 等等等等。是不是很准？

original: Wow, where's all the rage come from Chupacabra! Chill out, brother! Thinngs are dreadful, but that doesn't make them terminal. LMFAO.
translated: 哇，Chupacabra这么大脾气干嘛！冷静点，兄弟！现实很糟糕，但也不是无药可救啊。笑死我了。

original: Sorry, I gave up rehab yesterday... I'm really loaded on antis.
translated: 抱歉，昨天刚从戒毒所出来... 已经吃上抗抑郁药了

original: I thought that you guys understood. I'm running the bath... this is Bildeberg signing off one last time...
translated: 我还以为你们能理解我。我要在浴缸里割腕了... 这就是Bildeberg的最后一帖...

original: Shit, I was only messing with you, Bildeberg.
translated: 妈的，我就跟你抬个杠而已，Bildeberg。
